alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:19PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan, northeastern Hawkins and south central Scott Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Gate City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Gate City, Surgoinsville, Weber City, Colonial Heights, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Clinchport, Bays Mountain Park and Sullivan Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
